name: Natuurmonumenten
goal:
1. To preserve and manage important natural sites
2. To preserve and manage the cultural heratige if they are present in the sites mentioned under point 1.
3. To further the preservation and restoration of nature and biodiversity in general.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture
euInitiatives:
Birds- and Habitats directives
Water Frame directive
Common Agricultural Policy
LIFE
Floods policy
NEC - Nitrates directive
